title: 🎬 Initial Commit
text: Winter break started recently and I decided to revamp my website.1 As I write this, I’m not even finished with some of the sections, but I wanted to use this as a space to remind myself how to do things in Quarto.

title: 🎬 Initial Commit
text:
Why Quarto?
Quarto is pretty similar to R Markdown, but it’s got elegant cross-referencing, multi-language support, and multiple column integration.2 However, the main caveat with all these features is that I will inevitably forget how to code something, which is why this post exists. If you’re curious, you can click on the </> Code button in the top right to see the source code of the post.

title: 🎬 Initial Commit
text:
